fields.name: home
fields.label: Home
fields.description: Drag to reorder the sections on the page.

fields.name: team
fields.label: Team
fields.description: Drag to reorder the order of appearance on the page.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: Enter a description below the title.

fields.label: Hero Image
fields.name: heroImgSrc
fields.description: Displays an image below the description.

fields.label: Caption
fields.name: caption
fields.description: Displays a caption below the hero image.

fields.label: Main Content
fields.name: content
fields.description: To insert a video, select 'Video' from the 'Embed' dropdown.

fields.name: src
fields.label: Source
fields.description: Enter a YouTube embedded link e.g. https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ?si=8HOpMTZzMyY_3Op7 or the filename of a video stored in the videos folder e.g. video.mp4.

fields.label: Section Content
fields.name: content
fields.description: To insert a video, select 'Video' from the 'Embed' dropdown. To link to an email, prepend the email with 'mailto'. For example, if linking to civictechlabnus@gmail.com, highlight the corresponding text and add a link with the URL 'mailto:civictechlabnus@gmail.com'.

fields.name: src
fields.label: Source
fields.description: Enter a YouTube embedded link e.g. https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ?si=8HOpMTZzMyY_3Op7 or the filename of a video stored in the videos folder e.g. video.mp4.

fields.label: Button Link
fields.description: Insert an external link, or the filename of a pdf file stored in reports.
fields.name: link
jobs
fields.label: Jobs
fields.description: Drag to reorder the jobs, the first item will be displayed first.

fields.name: sections
fields.label: Job Sections
fields.description: Drag to reorder the sections.

fields.name: content
fields.description: To link to an email, prepend the email with 'mailto'. For example, if linking to civictechlabnus@gmail.com, highlight the corresponding text and add a link with the URL 'mailto:civictechlabnus@gmail.com'.
fields.label: Job Section Content
Date From
fields.name: dateFrom
fields.description: At least one date must be here. Use this field for a single date or the start of a date range.

fields.label: Date To
fields.name: dateTo
fields.description: Use this field for the end of the date range.

fields.name: otherDates
fields.label: Other Dates
fields.description: Use this field for events on separate dates.

fields.label: Date
fields.name: date
fields.description: Another date the event is held on.

fields.label: Tags
fields.name: tags
fields.description: Tags are displayed in the order they are selected.

fields.label: Body
fields.name: body
fields.description: To insert a video, select 'Video' from the 'Embed' dropdown.

fields.name: src
fields.label: Source
fields.description: Enter a YouTube embedded link e.g. https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ?si=8HOpMTZzMyY_3Op7 or the filename of a video stored in the videos folder e.g. video.mp4.

fields.label: Header
fields.name: header
fields.description: Controls the top navigation in the application.

fields.label: Nav Links
fields.description: WARNING: Changing or deleting any of these fields might break the navigation on the website.
fields.name: nav

fields.label: Footer
fields.name: footer
fields.description: Controls the content displayed in the footer.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: To link to an email, prepend the email with 'mailto'. For example, if linking to civictechlabnus@gmail.com, highlight the corresponding text and add a link with the URL 'mailto:civictechlabnus@gmail.com'.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: To link to an email, prepend the email with 'mailto'. For example, if linking to civictechlabnus@gmail.com, highlight the corresponding text and add a link with the URL 'mailto:civictechlabnus@gmail.com'.

fields.label: Link
fields.description: Enter the page to link to, must begin with a slash. The home page is denoted by a single slash.
fields.name: href

fields.label: News Tags
fields.name: tags
fields.description: Controls the tags available when creating a news article.

fields.label: Tag
fields.name: tag
fields.description: WARNING: Deleting a tag may cause the news page to not function correctly. Only delete a tag when you are sure it is not in use.

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
